CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 6, 1973, pg. 27, reads: "Cross - Country Gospel Van - Pictured at the doorway of their well-equipped Gospel Van, the Rev. Frederick Blaylock, right and Deacon Williard Brown, both of Clark Memorial Baptist Church, followed the leading of the spirit to take their witness across state lines. Recently returned from a fruitful 'on the street ministry' in Boston, Mass., Newark, N. J. and Harrisburg, Pa., there are now off on a preaching and teaching tour through several southern states, and will return in time for the tribute, which as been planned for them by people of the Homestead community for Sunday Oct. 11 and 7:30 P.M. at the church.  - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Two men, possibly including Rev. Frederick Blaylock holding book, and two women, posed in front of Evangelical Street Ministry school bus "The Gospel Van"
